EmailTemplate.description: Sent by workflow when a case is closed
EmailTemplate.name: Customer Survey- English
EmailTemplate.subject: TE Customer Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact}:
Our top priority is to deliver an Extraordinary Customer Experience during each interaction that you have with our Customer Service organization.
Please take a moment to tell us how we are performing by providing your valuable feedback.
This message and brief survey attached are in reference to your recent interaction with TE Connectivity
The details of your interaction are as below
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Date Opened: {!Case.CreatedDate} Subject: {!Case.Subject}
Click the below link to take a quick survey
http://voiceofcustomer.te.com/s3/f52769412bba?Contact={!Contact.Id}&Account={!Account.Id}&Case={!Case.Id}
Thank you for your business. Best Regards TE Connectivity
Learn about TE at www.te.com
